1.title: Home Alone
1.plot: In the season premiere, Giuliana and Bill Rancic decide to move forward with the idea of a second child. As gestational carrier Delphine weighs the couple's proposal to go through the process again, Giuliana stresses over the prospect of having to find another perfect fit. As Bill jets off to Chicago to continue work on their new home, Giuliana's thoughts go to staying safe in an empty house. Follow along as she visits a gun range, takes self-defense classes and even meets a highly-trained attack dog!

3.title: Fifty Shades of G&B
3.plot: When Colet announces the release of her risque new book, Giuliana jumps at the chance to host a party in her honor. But can she convince Bill to give a public reading from the salacious novel? Meanwhile, it's moving day for The Rancics! Giuliana gets emotional as she bids farewell to their Los Angeles home, and wonders whether she's ready to leave for Chicago. Will Giuliana go back on her promise to Bill about moving the family?

4.title: Up in the Air
4.plot: How can Giuliana and Bill possibly find some time to ring in six years of marriage? It won't be easy with this schedule! First stop is New York, where Fashion Week is in full swing! Go behind the scenes of Giuliana's constant "E! News" coverage and front-row seats along the runway. Next, she's headed to Tampa for a 24-hour special on HSN! Can she sell 19,000 blazers in one day? Meanwhile, Bill gets an opportunity to fly with a top stunt pilot at an air show in Chicago. Can he convince G to let him fly?

5.title: The Italian Job
5.plot: The Rancics are making their parents proud! A visit with a Chicago boy with brain cancer makes a huge impact on Bill. Can he think up a gesture worthy of the boy's incredible story? Next, Giuliana's parents are overjoyed that their daughter is speaking at the Italian embassy in D.C. Will she live up to their lofty expectations? Plus, G thinks about getting a space for her fashion line!

6.title: Rancic and Relaxation
6.plot: Bill and Giuliana take Duke to Santa Barbara for a weekend getaway! Watch as they hike together, do a wine tasting, get a couples massage and coax Duke into taking his first steps in the city where they fell in love! Then, it's back to reality and new challenges for the Rancics. Bill wrestles with speaking at a correctional facility while Giuliana puts serious thought to posing topless for charity. Plus, more time working means less time together as a family. Their decisions will change how they approach their careers moving forward!

7.title: Saving Face
7.plot: Giuliana's makeup artist points out that the 39-year-old is starting to show her age and the TV host considers drastic measures. Meanwhile, Bill jets off to Kuwait for a speaking engagement with small business owners and students. The Rancics reunite in Chicago for FabFest, which benefits breast and ovarian cancer survivors. While G meets with two special survivors, Bill cooks up a scheme to help a small business and donate to Giuliana's Fab-U-Wish charity. See the pleasant surprise!

8.title: Marathon Not a Sprint
8.plot: The New York City Marathon is here! Bill is in The Big Apple to raise funds for breast cancer awareness and Giuliana's charity Fab-U-Wish. But between jet lag and his excitement, Bill steps to the starting line already low on energy. Meanwhile, G takes her parents on a three-day longevity workshop to teach them to be more health-conscious. Will the lessons take? Then, the family reunites in D.C., where Giuliana's dad is opening a new store! See if Bill can muster up the strength to attend just hours after running 26.2 miles. Plus, will surrogate Delphine agree to ...

9.title: Couples' Retreat
9.plot: Giuliana and Bill invite their friends to join them on a couples getaway retreat to Tahiti.

10.title: A Sibling for Duke?
10.plot: The couple are anxiously awaiting to hear whether their surrogate is pregnant with baby No. 2; at the same time, Giuliana gets to record a song with Dee Snider; and Bill rushes to finish their new Chicago home.

1.title: Home Sweet Home
1.plot: In the season premiere, Giuliana and Bill Rancic decide to move forward with the idea of a second child. As gestational carrier Delphine weighs the couple's proposal to go through the process again, Giuliana stresses over the prospect of having to find another perfect fit. As Bill jets off to Chicago to continue work on their new home, Giuliana's thoughts go to staying safe in an empty house. Follow along as she visits a gun range, takes self-defense classes and even meets a highly-trained attack dog!

2.title: Suburbs or the City
2.plot: Bill gets an offer on their new home and he and Giuliana decide they're going to sell the place they built together. Now they must decide - do they see themselves as city people or suburb people?

3.title: Italian Homecoming
3.plot: Giuliana and Bill head back to Giuliana's hometown of Bethesda, Maryland. Giuliana has been asked to be a presenter at a prestigious alumni event at her Alma Mater, the University of Maryland. Giuliana has to try to balance preparing for the event, and spending time with her family and friends during a whirlwind weekend on the east coast.

4.title: Jet Set Jitters
4.plot: Giuliana doesn't like to fly. She flies commercially because she has to - to spend time with Bill and for work. But she's always dreaded flying in a small plane. Giuliana decides she's going to conquer her fear of flight, and tries a series of therapies to get over her phobia - so she can fly with Bill once he gets his pilot's license.

5.title: Giuliana's Night Out
5.plot: Giuliana and Bill disagree over throwing a sixth-month birthday party for baby Duke.

6.title: California Dreamin'
6.plot: Bill spends a lot of time in Los Angeles - because it's where Giuliana lives. But he doesn't love LA. Giuliana tries to make Bill love LA by introducing him to some things only LA has to offer. Giuliana's assistant Matthew goes away on vacation so Giuliana gets a temp. She loves the temp, and considers replacing Matthew.

7.title: Cooking Up Trouble
7.plot: Giuliana and Bill try to find a hobby they both enjoy that they can do together. Giuliana grew up in a big Italian family with regular Sunday dinners. She wants to start a Sunday dinner tradition of her own... the only problem is she doesn't know how to cook.

8.title: Surprise
8.plot: Giuliana throws a revealing baby shower for Monica. Plus, she seeks help from a life coach.

9.title: The Detox Retreat
9.plot: Giuliana and Colet decide to go to cleansing retreat. Bill doesn't think Giuliana can handle the intensity of a cleanse, but she wants to give it a shot. While Giuliana is away Bill and some of his Chicago buddies end up in Vegas for a boy's weekend.

10.title: I Do, Take Two
10.plot: After attempting to legally change her name to Rancic from De Pandi, Giuliana learns the Italian marriage certificate she and Bill have isn't valid in America. So Giuliana and Bill need to get legally married in the states. Meanwhile, Giuliana and Bill's priest insists they go through a pre-cana course before he will marry them.

1.title: Knocked Up?
1.plot: After taking a home pregnancy test, and learning they are not pregnant, Giuliana and Bill discuss if they are ready to have a baby. While Giuliana is preparing to host the red carpet at the Emmys, she volunteers to babysit for a co-workers son. Giuliana and Bill have their hands full babysitting... and it doesn't help that they're babysitting the night before Giuliana has a big day of work at the Emmys. During the Emmy broadcast, Giuliana blurts out that she and Bill are trying to have kids. Bill is shocked that Giuliana shared that personal information on national ...

2.title: Operation Ovulation
2.plot: Giuliana and Bill are settling into their new Chicago home, and discuss getting medical help to get pregnant. They meet with a doctor who advises them to keep trying naturally, but outlines a fertility plan. Giuliana and Bill talk with friends who have been through the ovulation process, and Giuliana and Matthew plot out Giuliana's ovulation on a calendar. Bill has to fly to Indiana and Virginia (for speaking engagements) and to New York (to appear on Rachel Ray)... while Giuliana is in her prime ovulation time. Bill tries to make it home to Giuliana, before the ...

3.title: Family Matters
3.plot: Giuliana and Bill go to Maryland for a 10k run in memory of Bill's father. While they are there Giuliana catches up with high school friends, and she and Bill debate whether or not to tell their families they are going to a doctor for fertility treatments.

4.title: Child's Play
4.plot: Giuliana is asked to appear on Are You Smarter than a Fifth Grader, and Bill flies with the Air Force Thunderbirds. Giuliana and Bill get surprising news from their fertility doctor.

5.title: Couple's Retreat
5.plot: Who needs a vacation? The Rancics set off for the beautiful La Taha'a Island Resort and Spa in Tahiti with four friends! Couples Brenda and Ari and Colet and Farzin find out when they arrive at their island destination that there's more than rest and relaxation on the schedule. G and B have relationship-building exercises planned for everyone--including kayak relay races, snorkeling and a romantic luau! Plus, Giuliana agrees to take massage lessons if Bill learns how to blow out her hair. See who shows a knack for pampering their lover!

6.title: Made in Hong Kong
6.plot: Giuliana is invited by E! to go to Hong Kong to promote the network internationally. She and Bill decide to go - and they both find themselves balancing business and pleasure - as Bill has set up speaking engagements for himself. While in Hong Kong Giuliana starts a series of shots to get ready for the next step in the fertility process.

7.title: Make Room for Giuliana
7.plot: Giuliana wants to make Bill's house "their" house... and Giuliana & Bill take a big step in the fertility process.

8.title: Maybe... Baby?
8.plot: Giuliana and Bill learn big news about their fertility process... and Giuliana deals with losing her assistant Matthew, who unexpectedly quits.

1.title: Baby Steps
1.plot: Giuliana & Bill decide that having a family is their top priority. So they must make time in their non-stop schedules for IVF. Will they succeed?

2.title: Honey, Where's Home?
2.plot: With a baby on the way, Giuliana and Bill finally choose between Chicago & LA and whether they take on another demanding home renovation.

3.title: A Heartbreaking Loss
3.plot: As Giuliana and Bill begin to plan their lives as parents, they are blindsided with devastating news.

4.title: Picking Up the Pieces
4.plot: Giuliana and Bill find ways to cope with their loss.

5.title: Roadtrip
5.plot: Giuliana and Bill take a road trip to get away from stress at home.

6.title: Viva la Mancation
6.plot: Bill and his buddies go to Vegas while Giuliana hits the road to run a marathon.

7.title: The Model Aunt
7.plot: Giuliana and Bill take a step away from remodeling their Hinsdale home when Giuliana's niece Olivia comes to visit her in New York. Giuliana turns into a "stage aunt," and goes into overdrive trying to help Olivia pursue her dream of becoming a model.

8.title: Mamma Mia!
8.plot: As Giuliana continues to battle with the idea of whether or not to try in vitro fertilization again, her doctor gives suggestions for taking the next step. Meanwhile, her parents go on a cruise for their anniversary, and Giuliana feels it's the perfect time to redecorate their kitchen as a surprise gift.

9.title: Party Under Pressure
9.plot: Giuliana plans a friend's baby shower as she struggles to conceive herself. Bill rushes to finish the new house before the condo sells.

10.title: Last Chance
10.plot: Giuliana and Bill race to finish their new home in time for their final round of IVF treatments.

1.title: The Year of Fun
1.plot: Giuliana and Bill decide to enjoy a year of fun but a wrench is thrown in their plans.

2.title: Rancics Go Royal
2.plot: Bill moves to Los Angeles to be with Giuliana, but she's leaving the country to cover the Royal Wedding.

3.title: The DePandi Moving Company
3.plot: Giuliana's parents help the couple lay down roots in Los Angeles.

4.title: Food Fight
4.plot: Giuliana and Bill clash over where to open Mama DePandi's Italian restaurant.

5.title: Where to Next, Bill?
5.plot: Giuliana's building frustrations with Bill's travel schedule are tempered when Bill travels to tragedy stricken Haiti.

6.title: The Big 4-0
6.plot: As Bill's 40th birthday approaches, Giuliana is determined to pull off an amazing surprise party for him in Chicago so he can celebrate this milestone with his family and friends. But when Bill starts to catch on to her scheme, she decides to move the bash to Las Vegas to throw him off.

7.title: It's Bill's Party and He'll Cry If He Wants To
7.plot: Giuliana struggles to keep Bill's surprise birthday party under wraps.

8.title: All in the Familia
8.plot: A family vacation in Italy takes a wrong turn when Bill breaks some news about the restaurant.

9.title: It's Complicated
9.plot: Giuliana and Bill tackle what to do about the restaurant and starting IVF again.

10.title: It's Complicated
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: The Battle Begins
1.plot: Giuliana and Bill are on the hunt for a new house to raise their soon-to-be-born baby.

2.title: The Booby Trap
2.plot: Giuliana and Bill are on the hunt for a new house to raise their soon-to-be-born baby.

3.title: Baby Mama?
3.plot: Giuliana goes public with her diagnosis and considers other ways to conceive.

4.title: Surgery Day
4.plot: Mother's day is around the corner and Giuliana is dropping hints to Bill about the special day.

5.title: Baby Dreams
5.plot: On this special episode of "Giuliana and Bill," follow the emotional journeys of real-life couples who chose surrogacy as their path to parenthood.

6.title: Back with a Bounce
6.plot: Giuliana returns to work and awaits their baby's first ultrasound.

7.title: New House Hunters
7.plot: Giuliana and Bill toy with living in Chicago or L.A.

8.title: 48 Hour Hustle
8.plot: Bill returns to Haiti and has only 48 hours to build a home for a family affected by the 2010 hurricane.

9.title: Mama DePandi's Big Night
9.plot: The day has finally come for Giuliana and Bill's big restaurant opening in Chicago!

10.title: What Happens in Cabo ...
10.plot: While Giuliana awaits news of the "safe zone," Bill secretly plans a weekend getaway in Cabo.

11.title: Boy or Girl?
11.plot: The couple jets to Colorado to see their baby's twelve-week ultrasound.

12.title: Marriage Rules
12.plot: Giuliana and Bill Rancic share their secrets to a lasting marriage in this clip special.

13.title: We're Having a ...
13.plot: Giuliana and Bill reveal the gender of their baby at their baby shower.

14.title: Babies Hate Me!
14.plot: Giuliana babysits her niece Sydney to get used to being around children more often.

15.title: How to Be a Sexy Mom
15.plot: While the couple preps their new house for the baby, Giuliana worries that she will lose her "Momjo."

16.title: Who's Your Nanny?
16.plot: Giuliana interviews British nannies while in London covering the Olympics.

17.title: She's Having a Baby
17.plot: The Rancics leave their friends and jobs behind to await their baby's arrival in Colorado.

18.title: Meet the Duke!
18.plot: Giuliana and Bill welcome their son to the world.

19.title: Duke of Hazzard
19.plot: Giuliana and Bill prepare for baby Duke's first photo shoot and adjust to life as new parents.

20.title: Daddy Duty
20.plot: Giuliana struggles with being away from Bill and baby Edward Duke as she returns to hosting duties at the Emmy Awards red carpet.

21.title: Holy Baby!
21.plot: The Rancics baptize Duke before saying goodbye to Chicago and heading to their new home in LA.

0.title: Rancic Rewind
0.plot: Giuliana and Bill create a home video for Duke to tell him the story of their family.

1.title: Baby Hogs
1.plot: In the season premiere, Giuliana and Bill are obsessed with their little baby Duke--so much so, there doesn't seem enough time to share him!

2.title: Duke's Nanny & Pedi
2.plot: Giuliana and Bill are on the hunt for a nanny and pediatrician to look after Duke.

3.title: G-String Surprise
3.plot: It's time for Giuliana to pass the baby baton to her coworker and friend Monica who is expecting! Giuliana's assistant Sarah helps her organize a baby shower, but she's leaving Robbie in charge of the entertainment--which may either be the best idea or the craziest. Meanwhile, Bill undergoes an extensive physical at a Chicago hospital that yields surprising results. Plus, Giuliana seeks the help of a life coach to balance her new demands as a working mother.

4.title: Duking It Out
4.plot: With Duke almost six months old and keeping Giuliana and Bill up all night long crying, the couple has become extremely sleep deprived. Giuliana calls upon a sleep specialist to help with the issue. Meanwhile, Giuliana prepares for Duke's sixth-month birthday by throwing him a birthday party that Bill is not thrilled about. Then, the Rancics head to Miami where they are hosting a fashion event featuring Giuliana's line, G by Giuliana. However, the sample pieces don't come without drama attached!

5.title: Baby on the Loose
5.plot: Giuliana and Bill realize it's time to start thinking about babyproofing, but they disagree about the best way to go forward.

6.title: Is Nonna Getting Botox?
6.plot: Giuliana and Bill focus on a new restaurant idea. Plus, Giuliana plans a party for her mom's 70th birthday.

7.title: G's First Mother's Day
7.plot: Mother's day is around the corner and Giuliana is dropping hints to Bill about the special day. Although Bill acts like he doesn't have anything planned, Bill always has a plan! Meanwhile, he and Giuliana's friends think she has a hoarding problem. And her friend Robbie sets up an interesting intervention. Then, Giuliana takes a stab at whipping up her mother's famous recipes before they decide to put together a cookbook.

8.title: One Tough Tot
8.plot: Giuliana tries to conquer her fears, so that Duke won't follow in her footsteps.

9.title: Rancic Family Vacation
9.plot: The Rancics take a family vacation to Mexico with their buddies and reinstates the Rancic Challenge--this time with kids! Even though it's all in fun, Giuliana and Bill go all out to try to win it all. As they're surrounded by adorable tots, Giuliana finds a moment to ask Bill if he's ready for another child.

10.title: Time for Baby No. 2
10.plot: In the season finale, Giuliana and Bill decide they want Duke to have a younger sibling.

imdb.plot outline: E! New reporter Giuliana Rancic and her husband, "Apprentice" winner Bill Rancic, lead a whirlwind life. She's a TV personality in LA, while Bill is a real estate developer and businessman in Chicago. These newlyweds live in different cities, with very different lives, but still manage to make it work.
imdb.title: Giuliana & Bill
plot: E! New reporter Giuliana Rancic and her husband, "Apprentice" winner Bill Rancic, lead a whirlwind life. She's a TV personality in LA, while Bill is a real estate developer and businessman in Chicago. These newlyweds live in different cities, with very different lives, but still manage to make it work.::Vince Rotonda
